name: Auto Approve Bot
description: Auto approve telegram group/channel join requests bot.

API_ID.description: Enter your API_ID, get it from my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: Enter your API_HASH, get it from my.telegram.org/apps

BOT_TOKEN.description: Enter your Bot token, get it from @BotFather

CHANNEL.description: Enter your Force Subscribe channel Username without @

Channel_ID.description: Enter your channel id from where you want to broadcast posts

DELAY.description: Delay in seconds before channel join request should be accepted. Enter 0 to disable it

START_PIC.description: Link of the photo you want to use as start pic make sure it is telegraph link or any other link which can be directly accessed by the link
